Posts.Content: Dr. Robert Kuski from Scottsdale, Arizona invented this treatment. I highly recommend him. I had this treatment one year ago and chose this method because I was searching for a safer way to deliver radiation near the left chest wall without fear of radiating my heart muscle. I traveled over 1500 miles to go to this clinic. This is pain free, ingenious and quick method compared to other radiation methods I researched. I would be interested in hearing why you are interested in this procedure so I could respond more directly since you are a male. The jury is still out as to being more effective, but I was told by Dr. Kuski himself that it is equally effective treatment.
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: After my SAVI radiation in October, I got an infection at the point of the entry in my left breast, not while I was under doctor care. Their is redness in the area where treatment was delivered. I have a small blood clot that doesn't seem to go away, but it could be a result of the initial surgery to remove the tumor. I have a lot of energy and continued my normal affairs right away. Let me know how things go with your Mom today. I am sending happy thoughts her way. Is she in Arizona?
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: How is your Mom feeling today? Did they put in the savi instrument on Friday or was it her consultation and they begin on Monday? I keep sending good thoughts her way. I hear her doctors are excellent and they have many press releases sent out from the medical center in San Diego.
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: How long ago did your Mom have her lumpectomy? How is she doing? Are you with her? Does she live in the area or did you travel to San Diego for this procedure?
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: Please tell her I am praying for her and thinking of her daily. She is so very blessed to have you there with her. I drank Bolthouse Farms, Acai/Pomegranite juice every day while I was in treatment and had energy to burn! You can buy it at Whole Foods. It is so delicious.
